name: PORTRAIT OF DANTE | SPECIAL EDITION
description:
Durante Alighieri, known as Dante, is an Italian poet of the Middle Ages, born in Florence in 1265, died in Ravenna on September 14, 1321. 

Dante was immortalized by the composition of the famous poem known as the Divine Comedy: the author imagines that Virgil, his favorite poet, accompanies him in Hell and Purgatory, to name the reprobates and describe their torments, and that Beatrix (or Beatrice) is his guide in Paradise. 


Directed by AI & I | NFT format 1080x1080 | Minted 2021.11.07
